page.title: 01Industry in Flint
page.content:
Courtaulds once had three factories Flint, the Deeside, the Aber and the Castle Works. Most people from Flint who could work worked in Courtaulds'{ factories, sometimes whole families worked there.
When my Mum left school she worked at Deeside and Aber, my Grandad worked at those two and my Nana worked in all three of them. My aunties, uncles and great aunties and uncles worked for Courtaulds too. The main product manufactured at Courtaulds was yarn. The outstanding features of Flint were Courtaulds' factory chimneys, they were almost 400 feet high and there were many of them. The last two were demolished three years ago.
All of Courtaulds' works in Flint have been demolished. Nobody works for the
